Name: Athereon: Advent I
About the game: Athereon is a parallel universe immersed within an epic fantasy party-based RPG. The Advent series takes place on planet Atherdora with civilization demarcated to 8 federations. 'Advent I' encompasses only the Halogrom Federation on the Atherdora map. FEATURES ■ Role-Playing Video Game (can stand-alone from series) ■ Genre: Fantasy ■ Mode: Single-Player ■ Party-Based ■ 3D Third-Person Perspective Stylized-View ■ 3D Tactical Turn-Based Battle-View ■ Strategy Tactical Turn-Based Combat System ■ Character Class Group Architecture for Class Tier Hierarchy ■ Class Group: (15 Classes) Fighter ■ Class Group: (9 Classes) Mage ■ Class Group: (13 Classes) Psionite ■ Class Group: (17 Classes) Scout OPEN WORLD ENVIRONMENT ■ Interconnection by an Overworld Infrastructure ■ Overworld Geolocation System ■ Travel by Land & Sea EXPLORE ■ Atherdora (overworld) ■ Castles ■ Cities ■ Towns ■ Villages ■ Dungeons ■ Caves ■ Crypts ■ Mines ■ ... discover more NOTES ■ Due to the vast universe of Athereon, the Advent series will be tentatively released as 8 stand-alone video games. Each release will be demarcated to 1 of 8 federations from planet Atherdora. ■ Please see the Athereon website for further information and details.
